properties.title: Enderlinhütte SAC
properties.abstract: La cabane est fermée pendant les mois d'hiver à cause du danger d'avalanche
properties.description: Cosy log cabin in Bündner Herrschaft, above Maienfeld in the Rhine valley, in the western part of Rätikon. The quaint Enderlinhut lies slightly below the timber line on the way to Falknis or across Fläscher Fürggli and via Schesaplanahütte to Carschinahütte. Splendid view into the Pizol area, past Calanda to Rheinwaldhorn, and to the environs of Chur and Lenzerheide.
properties.city: Grison Alps, Glarus – St. Gallen – Appenzell
properties.place: Grison Alps, Glarus – St. Gallen – Appenzell
